snippet: On Wall Street, investors were concerned that a shutdown could make it more likely that the United States will default on its outstanding debt when it reaches its borrowing limit.
lead_paragraph: On Wall Street, investors were concerned that a shutdown could make it more likely that the United States will default on its outstanding debt when it reaches its borrowing limit.

headline.main: Markets Slide Worldwide Amid U.S. Budget Battle
headline.print_headline: Markets Slide on U.S. Budget Moves
